subject: With my head down
author: bhali333
full_text:
I would like to post this apology to Frank R. 
It was my mistake, in my haste I had not noticed that the post I was 
reffering to was made by Frank S. and not Frank R.

As usual my stupid brooklyn mouth ran ahead of my brain!
Apologies to Frank R. and the group for my indiscretion.

Now Frank S. I don't want to rewrite the whole post so just change the 
R> to an S. :)

Bruce
